languages.text: Each time the retargeted ability affects the allies, the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm receives +1 FEL. Each time the retargeted ability affects the enemies, the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm receives +1 INT. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Each time the retargeted ability affects the allies, the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm receives +1 FEL. Each time the retargeted ability affects the enemies, the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm receives +1 INT. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects allies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}экстраполированная{/g} через рой сервочерепов, действует на союзников, рой получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Когда такая способность действует на врагов, рой получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}. Суммируется.

Когда способность, {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}экстраполированная{/g} через рой сервочерепов, действует на союзников, рой получает +1 к Общительности. Когда такая способность действует на врагов, рой получает +1 к Интеллекту. Суммируется.

languages.text: Wenn eine durch den Servoschädel-Schwarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolierte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Verbündete beeinflusst, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Beeinflusst eine solche Fähigkeit Gegner, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects allies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn eine durch den Servoschädel-Schwarm {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolierte{/g} Fähigkeit Verbündete beeinflusst, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm +1 Gefolgschaft. Beeinflusst eine solche Fähigkeit Gegner, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm +1 Intelligenz. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'essaim de servocrânes {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapole{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, il gagne +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}. Si cette capacité touche des ennemis, il gagne +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects allies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'essaim de servocrânes {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapole{/g} une capacité, il gagne +1 de Sociabilité. Si cette capacité touche des ennemis, il gagne +1 d'Intelligence. Cumulable.

languages.text: 当伺服头骨集群{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，若影响的目标是盟友，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}提高1点，若影响的目标是敌人，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高1点。
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects allies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 当伺服头骨集群{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}能力时，若影响的目标是盟友，则社交提高1点，若影响的目标是敌人，则智力提高1点。

languages.text: Cuando una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolada{/g} por el enjambre de servocráneos afecta a aliados, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. Cuando una capacidad extrapolada afecta a enemigos, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects allies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando una capacidad {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolada{/g} por el enjambre de servocráneos afecta a aliados, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +1 de Empatía. Cuando una capacidad extrapolada afecta a enemigos, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +1 de Inteligencia. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: サーヴォスカル・スウォームによって{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿された{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方に影響を与える間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が+1される。そのアビリティが敵に影響を与える間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+1される。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolated{/g} through the servo-skull swarm affects allies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: サーヴォスカル・スウォームによって{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿された{/g}アビリティが味方に影響を与える間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの連帯が+1される。そのアビリティが敵に影響を与える間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの知性が+1される。この効果はスタックする。
サーヴォスカル・スウォームによって{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿された{/g}アビリティが味方に影響を与える間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの連帯が+1される。そのアビリティが敵に影響を与える間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの知性が+1される。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Hizmelet sürüsü aracılığıyla {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlenen{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, dost birimleri etkilediğinde hizmelet sürüsü +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} kazanır. Böyle bir kabiliyet düşmanları etkilediğinde ise hizmelet sürüsü +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Whenever such an ability affects enemies, the servo-skull swarm gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}. Stacks.
